Name: BAD DAY
About the game: 'ALL THIS HAPPENED IN A MOMENT, THE DEADLY VIRUS BROKE FREE AND EVERYBODY AROUND TURNED INTO BLOODTHIRSTY MONSTERS. AND ONLY FOUR STRANGERS MANAGED TO SURVIVE, NOW THEY ARE TO STRUGGLE WITH DANGEROUS THINGS TO SURVIVE...' OVERVIEW Choose one of the characters to start. Shoot monsters. Save bullets. Be careful, one death is one life spent. BRIEF TASKS DESCRIPTION - search the boxes. - search the buildings and hide there. - keyboard and mouse control. - beware of underground worms. - two types of weapon. - a lack of bullets. - a large number of monsters. Controls instruction inside game
